module.title: bho
module.p: bho is a preposition meaning from.
Some temporal uses of bho are –

ol.li:
Introducing an adverbial of temporal limit, modifying a imperfective verb and locating the initial boundary of the state or activity –
from – the state/activity either starts in the future (seinnidh i bho 8f she will sing from 8pm), or starts in the past and does not continue to the present (sheinn i bho 8f she sang from 8pm
since – the state/activity starts in the past and continues up to the present – tha i a’ seinn bho 8f she has been singing since 8pm
In the adverb of frequency bho àm gu àm from time to time, occasionally – bho àm gu àm rachadh e dhan bhaile mhòr from time to time he would go to the city
